entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 11:30 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: NE 34 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 20 January 2023
